q1.name: Bramble Smash
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Maokai''' releases an arcane shockwave that travels forth in a line in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies it passes through and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 99% for {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
Enemies near '''Maokai''' are also {{tip|stun|stunned}} for {{fd|0.5}} seconds and {{tip|airborne|knocked back}} up to 300 units based on their proximity to him.
q1.notes: * ''Bramble Smash'' will cast from wherever '''Maokai''' is at the end of the cast time.

w1.name: Twisted Advance
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Maokai''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target enemy while being {{tip|untargetable}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} on arrival and {{tip|root|rooting}} them for a duration.
w1.notes:
* ''Twisted Advance'' will not deal its damage nor apply the {{tip|root}} if the target is {{tip|untargetable}}.
* '''Maokai''' will follow any {{tip|dash|dashes}} or {{tip|blink|blinks}} the target performs.
** He will dash to their original location if they {{tip|blink}} to a very far distance (e.g, {{si|Recall}}, {{si|Teleport}}, {{ai|Gate|Twisted Fate}}, {{ai|Stand United|Shen}}).
** There is a range limit in how far he can follow a moving target.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 40% AP)

  • Root Duration:

e1.name: Sapling Toss
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Maokai''' {{tip|projectile|flings}} a ''Sapling'' to the target location, {{tip|sight|revealing}} {{tt|the area|can see across terrain from the center, but not into bush}} in a small radius.

Once landed, ''Saplings'' have a 475 sight radius and remain stationary for 30 seconds or until they react to the first nearby visible enemy, chasing them for up to {{fd|2.5}} seconds, exploding upon colliding with any enemy or at the end of its duration, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies upon detonation, capped at 300 against non-champions, and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 35% for 2 seconds.

''Saplings'' placed in a {{tip|brush}} instead have a 30 {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% '''bonus''' health)}} second duration and additionally {{tip|sight|reveal}} struck targets for 2 seconds, dealing a total of 200% damage to them over the duration, capped at 600 against non-champions.
leveling: {{st|Increased Magic Damage|{{ap|50|100|150|200|250}} {{as|(+ {{ap|14|14.5|15|15.5|16}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
e1.notes:
* Applies {{tip|area damage}} from a normal ''Sapling'' and deals {{tip|persistent damage}} to enemies hit by an empowered ''Sapling''.
* ''Saplings'' have a base [[movement speed]] of 400, increased based on '''Maokai's''' [[boots]]:
** {{ii|Boots of Speed}}: 425
** {{ii|Berserker's Greaves}}, {{ii|Ionian Boots of Lucidity}}, {{ii|Mercury's Treads}}, {{ii|Ninja Tabi}} and {{ii|Sorcerer's Shoes}}: 445
** {{ii|Boots of Swiftness}} and {{ii|Boots of Mobility}}: 460
* ''Sapling Toss'' grants {{tip|sight}} of the target location even while the ''Sapling'' is in flight.
* The ''Saplings'' will continue to chase their target even if they lose {{tip|sight}} of them (but they do not prioritize champions so they will chase the first target they encounter).
* ''Saplings'' will appear on the map as minions despite being untargetable and invulnerable.
* ''Saplings'' cannot stack on top of each other (they will move a short distance away from one another if they are aimed at the same location).
* {{tip|Spell shield}} does not negate the damage from an empowered ''Sapling''.
* The damage of empowered ''Saplings'' is equally split into chunks of {{fd|66.7}}% of the normal ''Sapling'' damage every second, once immediately, and then at the 1 and 2 second mark.
* {{Pending for test}}: {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} interaction with a flying ''Sapling''.
* ''Saplings'' attack {{ui|Baron Nashor}} always at the same two points, no matter where they were placed.[[File:Sapling Toss Baron_Nashor.png|center|200px]]

r1.name: Nature's Grasp
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Maokai''' summons a colossal wall of 5 thorny brambles that slowly advances in the target direction, accelerating over time, each stopping at the first enemy {{tip|champion}} they collide with.

Each bramble deals {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|root|roots}} enemies for {{pp|type=distance traveled|0.8 to 2.6|0 to 1000 by 100|formula=Starts at 0.8 seconds and increases up to 2.6 seconds over 1000 units traveled}} seconds.
r1.notes:
* Any one enemy champion can be affected by ''Nature's Grasp'' more than once; they can be damaged and rooted by other brambles even after already colliding with one.
* The brambles permeate through terrain.
* ''Nature's Grasp'' is always cast from the original casting position.
